name: Back to Saturn X Episode 2: Tower in the Fountain of Sparks
description: Pwad file from the Doomworld forums. Requires either the DOOM 2 or the Freedoom phase 2 iwad to play.

files.doom2: N/A:Please select either the DOOM 2 or Freedoom phase 2 iwad file.

content:
files:
- doom2: N/A:Please select either the DOOM 2 or Freedoom phase 2 iwad file.
- btsx: http://esselfortium.net/wasd/btsx_e2_b3.zip
game:
  args: -deh btsx_e2.deh
  files:
  - btsx_e2a.wad
  - btsx_e2b.wad
  main_file: $doom2
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    src: $btsx
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $doom2
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/btsx_e2a.wad
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/btsx_e2b.wad
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/btsx_e2.deh
